snippet: DEL TUFO--Robert. Bob was a rare sage. He was smart, wise and mature in matters of organization and strategy of all kinds. Always a secure bellwether of integrity. Daytop's fate would surely have suffered in the absence of his determined stature and steady hand when things became chaotic. He was an oracle, a muse, often whimsical and self-depreciating...all of which embodied a disarming charm and eloquence that is hard to forget. He will be missed. Daytop Village Trustees and Family Association and our new partners Samaritan Village 1/3
